snippet: The latest figures released this week by the Law School Admissions Council show that nearly 11 percent fewer people took the LSAT in October than the year before.
abstract: Law School Admissions Council releases figures showing that nearly 11 percent fewer people took the Law School Admission Test in October 2013 than year before, sign that students recognize continuing slump in legal field.
lead_paragraph: The latest figures released this week by the Law School Admissions Council show that nearly 11 percent fewer people took the LSAT in October than the year before.

headline.main: Drop in LSAT Takers Shows Legal Field’s Slump
headline.print_headline: Drop In Lsat Takers Shows Legal Field’s Slump
